org.teatrove.trove.file
Class SystemFileBuffer

java.lang.Object
  org.teatrove.trove.file.SystemFileBuffer
All Implemented Interfaces:
FileBuffer
public final class SystemFileBuffer
extends Object
implements FileBuffer

An implementation of FileBuffer that makes direct calls into the operating system's file I/O functions. This class requires a native library: org.teatrove_trove_file_SystemFileBuffer.

Author:
Brian S O'Neill
